name: roadassist
description: A roadside assistance application for vehicle diagnostics and emergency assistance

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd roadassist-backend && npm run dev" "cd roadassist-app && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:turbo: concurrently "cd roadassist-backend && npm run dev" "cd roadassist-app && npm run dev:turbo"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd roadassist-backend && npm start" "cd roadassist-app && npm start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd roadassist-app && npm install && cd ../roadassist-backend && npm install
